paper_abstract: We characterize those subsets YaS dagger a"e (n) such that for every infinite XaS dagger a"e (n) , there is a red/blue coloring of a"e (n) having no monochromatic red set similar to X and no monochramtic blue set similar to Y.
paper_title: An Improvement to "A Note on Euclidean Ramsey Theory"
